roleset.name: ubiquitinate

example.name: ubiquitinate-v: active use
example.text: We ubiquitinated bacterially expressed GST-TRAF6 with Lys63-linked chains using the in vitro ubiquitination reaction.
example.arg: using the in vitro ubiquitination reaction.

example.name: ubiquitinate-v: with result
example.text: A sizable proportion of the histone H2A and H2B pool is ubiquitinated to form uH2A and uH2B in interphase ceils.
example.arg: A sizable proportion of the histone H2A and H2B pool

example.name: ubiquination-n
example.text: Hypoxia inhibits the ubiquination of HIF-1alpha

roleset.note: UBIQUINATE-V NOTES: Created for Bio-AMR annotations.
